title: Hostel
content:
I'm joined EC campus through kcet. I got PES EC CSE in mock 1 nd   aiml in mock 2. Just in case I don't get CSE in round 1 , I should get it in round 2, but in that time I've heard all the hostels would be booked. How do I book a hostel before that? I called the warden and he said u need an admission letter from college to get a hostel here. Pls tell me what to do.

Btw I'm talking abt the aamatra hostel for ec campus.

comments.body: i too got pes ec cse+aiml in mock 2, i think i will also join pes ec cse in round 2.
and what are the girls hostel charges ?
Same as boys ig. 120k per year + 30k caution deposit

ohh , better man 

i got scared that hostel fees will be more than college fees
Lmao yeah hostels pretty expensive in banglore
Bc batao to sahi kya karna hai??
